RandomMeas

Documentation for RandomMeas.jl: The randomized measurements toolbox in julia

  • Acquisition routines
  • Postprocessing routines
  • Postprocessing routines for classical shadows
  • Routines for simulating quantum circuits
  • Additional useful routines for ITensor

Acquisition routines

RandomMeas.get_Born — Method
 get_Born(ρ::MPO)

Construct Born Probability vector P(s) from an MPO representation ρ

source
RandomMeas.get_Born — Method
get_Born(ψ::MPS)

Construct Born Probability vector P(s)=|ψ(s)|^2 from an MPS representation ψ

source
RandomMeas.get_Born_MPS — Method
get_Born_MPS(ρ::MPO)

Construct Born Probability vector P(s)=<s|ρ|s> as an MPS from an MPO representation ρ

source
RandomMeas.get_Born_MPS — Method
get_Born_MPS(ψ::MPS)

Construct Born Probability vector P(s)=|ψ(s)|^2 as an MPS from an MPS representation ψ

source
RandomMeas.get_RandomMeas — Method
get_RandomMeas(ρ::Union{MPO,MPS}, u::Vector{ITensor})

Sample randomized measurements from a MPS/MPO representation ρ

source
RandomMeas.get_RandomMeas_MPO — Method
get_RandomMeas_MPO

Sample randomized measurements from an MPO representation ρ. The sampling is based from the MPO directly, i.e is memory-efficient

source
RandomMeas.get_RandomMeas_MPS — Method
get_RandomMeas_MPS(ψ::MPS, u::Vector{ITensor},NM::Int64)

Sample randomized measurements from an MPS representation ψ. The sampling is based from the MPS directly, i.e is memory-efficient

source
RandomMeas.get_Samples_Flat — Method
get_Samples_Flat(state::Union{MPO,MPS},NM::Int64)

Sample randomized measurements from a MPS/MPO representation ρ

source
RandomMeas.get_rotation — Method
get_rotation(ξ::Index{Int64}, cat::Int)

Generate a single qubit unitary with indices (ξ',ξ) Categories specified by cat: #1: Haar #2: Pauli #6: Identity matrix

source
RandomMeas.get_rotations — Function
get_rotations!

Generate a list of N single qubit unitaries to be applied on each qubit

source

Postprocessing routines

RandomMeas.get_Born — Method
get_Born(data::Array{Int8},ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}})

Construct histogram from randomized measurements as an ITensor representing the estimated Born probability

source
RandomMeas.get_overlap — Method
get_overlap(prob1::ITensor,prob2::ITensor,ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}},N::Int64)

Extract an overlap estimation $\mathrm{tr}(\rho_1\rho_2)$ from two estimated Born probabilities [See Elben et al 2019: Cross Platform verification of intermediate scale quantum devices]

source
RandomMeas.get_purity_hamming — Method
get_purity_hamming(data::Array{Int8},ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}})

Extract the purity from the Hamming distance formula purity = $\sum_s (-2)^{-D[s,s']}P(s)P(s')$ [Brydges et al, Science 2019]

source
RandomMeas.get_purity_shadows — Method
get_purity_shadows(data::Array{Int8},ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}})

Extract the purity from classical shadows

source

Postprocessing routines for classical shadows

RandomMeas.get_batch_shadows — Method
get_batch_shadows(data::Array{Int8}, ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}}, u::Vector{Vector{ITensor}}, n::Int64)

Constructs n batch shadows from measured data

source
RandomMeas.get_expect_shadow — Method
get_expect_shadow(O, shadow, ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}})

Contract shadow with operator O to estimate the expectation value $\mathrm{tr}(O\rho)$

source
RandomMeas.get_moments — Method
get_moments(shadow::Vector{ITensor}, ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}})

Obtain trace moments from a vector of (batch) shadows using U-statistics

source
RandomMeas.get_shadow — Method
get_shadow(P::ITensor, ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}}, u::Vector{ITensor};G::Union{Vector{Float64},Nothing}=nothing)

Form shadow from Born probability represented as an ITensor
source
RandomMeas.get_shadow_factorized — Method
get_shadow_factorized(data::Array{Int8}, s::Vector{Index{Int64}}, u::Vector{};G_vec::Union{Nothing,Vector{Float64}}=nothing)

build shadow as a tensor-product (memory-efficient)
source

Routines for simulating quantum circuits

RandomMeas.Apply_depo_channel — Method
Apply_depo_channel(ρ::MPO,p::Vector{Float64})

Apply depolarization channel on all qubits with probabilities specficied by the vector p

source
RandomMeas.RandomCircuit — Method
RandomCircuit(ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}},depth::Int64)

Create a random circuit of given depth. Returns the list of gates as a vector of ITensors

source

Additional useful routines for ITensor

RandomMeas.flatten — Method
flatten(O::Union{MPS,MPO,Vector{ITensor}})

convert a MPS/MPO to ITensor by a brutal multiplication A[1] x A[2] x ...

source
RandomMeas.get_entropy — Method
get_entropy(spec::ITensor)

compute von Neumann entropy from entanglement spectrum

source
RandomMeas.get_moment — Method
get_moment(spec::ITensor,n::Int)

compute the moments ``\mathrm{tr}(\rho)'' from the entanglement spectrum

source
RandomMeas.get_purity — Method
get_purity(ρ::MPO,part::Vector{Int64},ξ::Vector{Index{Int64}})

Compute the purity over the sites of part

source
RandomMeas.get_purity — Method
get_purity(ρ::MPO)

source

get_purity(ψ::MPS,i::Int64,j::Int64)

compute the purity over sites i:j

source
RandomMeas.get_purity — Method
get_purity(ψ::MPS,NA::Int64)

compute the purity of an MPS over the first NA sites

source

get_spectrum(ψ::MPS,NA::Int64)

source
